sentences.en: But in many ways the picture in Washington may be deteriorating.
sentences.cn: 但是在华盛顿，许多方面的情况可能是在恶化。

sentences.en: Effective measures must be taken to prevent the situation from deteriorating.
sentences.cn: 要采取有力措施,阻止事态的恶化.

sentences.en: Fibermax caulk is also used as a patchingmaterial around deteriorating burner blocks.
sentences.cn: Fibermax填缝材料还可用作维修炉体时的修补材料.

sentences.en: Firms may join forces to hide their own deteriorating performance.
sentences.cn: 公司也许会联合起来用兼并的方法来掩瞒它们日趋恶化的市场表现.

sentences.en: He targets the economy as the root cause of the deteriorating law and order situation.
sentences.cn: 他抨击经济是治安状况不断恶化的根源。

sentences.en: His disease is deteriorating rapidly . It needs prompt attention.
sentences.cn: 不能再继续稽延了,他的病情在快速恶化.

sentences.en: His health has been deteriorating in these latter years.
sentences.cn: 最近几年他的健康越来越差.

sentences.en: His health is deteriorating from fatigue.
sentences.cn: 他的健康状况因疲劳而恶化.

sentences.en: I was well aware of the bad morale and the deteriorating factories.
sentences.cn: 我很清楚,大家情绪低落,各个工厂越搞越坏.

sentences.en: If you raise the issue of your father's deteriorating health and he changes the subject, you can try to gently raise it again, without pressuring him.
sentences.cn: 如果你向父亲提出了他健康恶化的问题，而他却改变了话题，你可以试着温和的再次把问题提出来，而不要强迫他。

sentences.en: In my point of view, we are in a prime time to curb the problem from deteriorating.
sentences.cn: 我认为，现在已经到了控制这个问题进一步恶化的成熟时机。

sentences.en: It is pathetic to watch her condition deteriorating day by day.
sentences.cn: 看著她的健康状况日益恶化,真是可怜.

sentences.en: Regular check - ups allow early detection when a miner's health is deteriorating.
sentences.cn: 如果矿工的健康状况下降,常规的检查是能够在早期发现问题的.

sentences.en: Standards of living were deteriorating rather noticeably.
sentences.cn: 生活水平下降得十分明显。

sentences.en: There is an unquestionable link between job losses and deteriorating services.
sentences.cn: 人员的裁减和服务质量的下降之间显然是有联系的。

sentences.en: With things deteriorating the way they were, the President needed the Old Man again.
sentences.cn: 随着治安情况越来越坏, 总统又想起老头子来了.

trans.tran_cn: 恶化，变坏( deteriorate的现在分词 )
